# Pandas 官方教程（10 分钟搞定 Pandas、Pandas 秘籍、学习 Pandas）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/pandas-guanfang-jiaocheng-10-fenzhong-gaoding-pandas-pandas-miji-xuexi-pandas
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/pandas-guanfang-jiaocheng-10-fenzhong-gaoding-pandas-pandas-miji-xuexi-pandas
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install pandas-guanfang-jiaocheng-10-fenzhong-gaoding-pandas-pandas-miji-xuexi-pandas
pandas-guanfang-jiaocheng-10-fenzhong-gaoding-pandas-pandas-miji-xuexi-pandas <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g pandas-guanfang-jiaocheng-yiling-fenzhong-gaoding-pandas-pandas-miji-xuexi-pandas
pandas-guanfang-jiaocheng-yiling-fenzhong-gaoding-pandas-pandas-miji-xuexi-pandas <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
